labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Channel list doesn't load at all and you can't click on any channels in it, and it will only load when you move to another channel
data.expected_result: Channel list and user list loads properly
data.short_description: Channel list disappearing when opening New Group DM dialogue and using Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the New Group DM dialogue, either with Ctrl+Shift+T, or manually going to the friends list and clicking on it - Open the Quick Switcher with Ctrl+T or Ctrl+K, and then go to a text channel in a server from there (no voice channels, DMs, or group DMs). The channel HAS to be in a server that is already loaded/cached in the client, otherwise the client will request the server's data, which will reload the channel list and the bug won't happen
